# faulty Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "faulty" {
  required_boolean = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `required_boolean` (Boolean) This boolean must be set. If false, it will fail.
